pitch.cc: Dan Haren is having trouble locating his four-seam fastball, missing the strike zone with his last three.
That was pitch number 45 for Dan Haren; his effectiveness may start slipping, as he holds opposing hitters to a .204 average in the first 45 pitches but they hit .258 off him after that.
